user_query: I'm planning a surprise anniversary party for my parents. Can you generate a nonsense word to use as the party theme? Also, provide me with an insult to playfully tease my parents during the celebration. Lastly, find a funny manatee joke to entertain the guests. Thank you!

TaskList.description: Generate a nonsense word to be used as the party theme.
Provide a playful insult to tease my parents during the celebration.
Find a funny manatee joke to entertain the guests.
